TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit InstanceCreationEditor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of a particular type of property from a drop-down box within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Usually, the text specified by <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.Text%2A> is displayed on the drop-down box from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> as a link or button. When clicked, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.Type> of the object to create.
